FuncDef:
The whitelist session-car ldp disable command disables the LDP whitelist session CAR function.
The undo whitelist session-car ldp disable command restores the LDP whitelist session CAR function.
By default, the LDP whitelist session CAR function is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The LDP session CAR function is enabled by default. It isolates packet channels between LDP sessions.
To disable this function on a device, run the whitelist session-car ldp disable command. LDP packets received by this device will be sent directly to the CPCAR channel. If the device receives a large number of LDP packets, packets from different LDP sessions may preempt bandwidth resources. Therefore, disabling this function is not usually recommended.
